name: GNU Accessibility Management Server
short_description: This project aims at developing a feature-rich, open source server-based analyzer that will focus on crawling/scanning web sites in an enterprise, monitoring them for W3C WAI or Section 508 Accessibility Guideline compliance, reporting (in W3C EARL format
